alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, northeastern Baker, northern Duval, southern Camden, southeastern Ware and southeastern Charlton Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Marys to 6 miles north of St. George. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Kings Ferry and Cisco Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
